response.overview: In the year 2030, music composed by A.I. surpasses the sales of music made by human beings.  In the following years gradually more desperate measures were taken by the pro-human music corporation (I.R.L.) to compete with its counterpart. Their last effort was merging a human with a computer creating a humanoid cyborg music maker.  I.R.L. only received one application for this infinite contract of servitude. A Danish producer who had faded into oblivion in the 2020s was their only choice and last hope. In 2035 Natal Zaks was merged with a state of the art computer and placed into productive isolation.
response.title: Synthesized Emotion
